clusterList.phrase: with full support from azizah as well as the pas and dap leadership and our friends in permatang pauh i am offering myself as an mp for the constituency
furthermore permatang pauh is anwar's home base which his wife pkr president datuk seri dr wan azizah wan ismail won even in 2004 at the height of bn's popularity
i have no problems with ezam former anwar ibrahim aide and pkr youth chief ezam mohd nor contesting the seat i think he will be a good candidate
we expected him to contest in permatang pauh although previously anwar said he might stand in bandar tun razak or kulim-bandar baharu this shows that he has been misleading the people
i do not think permatang pauh is really a safe seat for anwar taking into consideration all the controversies involving him at present
the general election was just held five months ago barisan nasional would give a strong fight this time around as now the prime minister datuk seri abdullah ahmad badawi's leadership is more stable
even if anwar wins it will not make any difference as barisan nasional would still continue to rule the country
we hope umno will let ezam to take on anwar in the by-election
the only reason kadima is actually holding primaries is because ehud olmert is now seen as a political liability

of course datuk seri abdullah ahmad badawi would like to achieve his two-thirds majority and he can get it if pas joins barisan nasional pas on the other hand is not very happy with being the smallest party in the opposition where the biggest say goes to pkr parti keadilan rakyat
